Malice:
 
He felt the old twisting anger rise up in him once again.  He had been doing so well keeping it supressed the last few days, since meeting Wolfblade then Blacknightmare.  But it felt like the burning rage was returning, and didn't know when he'd be able to calm down.  But thankfully it suddenly melted away when she suprised him with a passionate kiss.  At first total suprise kept him from doing anything, but he melted into the kiss and reciprocated, letting his love for her flow through him to her.  he held her closer, not willing to part with her for anything else in the world.  He'd have his spark ripped out of his chest before then.  He made a realization, one that would change their lives forever, but did not break the moment of passion, feeling the need to continue it until he no longer could.

Dark Mouse <raccoon7679@...> wrote:
Wolfblade::

She felt his arms holding her.  She used all her will power to not
move as he pleaded to her. Not being able to stand it any more, she
reached up and wrapped her arms tightly around his neck. Then, not
needing to open her optics, she leaned her head up and pressed her
lips against his. Her mech fluid tempurature rose instantly as her
lips met his. In her spark, she wanted to have this one moment last
forever.  Being held in his arms and kissing him.  In the history of
the kiss, only 5 were rated for being the most passionate and the most
pure.  She wanted this kiss to blow all them away. 


"HA!  Is that all you got?  You boasted such power, such skill!  Where is your power and skill now?  You disappoint me, ha ha ha haa!" 

		
---------------------------------
